alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 5:44AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG ACROSS THE MOUNTAINS AND FOOTHILLS THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog, reducing visibility to 1/4 mile or less will continue this morning across the mountains valleys, as well as the Catawba River Valley in the foothills. Motorists traveling along I-40 through western North Carolina, along I-26 through the North Carolina mountains, and other roads and highways across the area should be prepared for sudden deterioration in visibility. Slow down, use low beam headlight, and leave extra room between you and the vehicle in front of you. The dense fog should improve in most areas by 900 AM.
